divs: Sighting DetailsWe were outside and our friend Dave called us and told us to look south west and we saw 3 glowing red orbs to that direction right under the moon. They werent moving in a straight line like a plane and were just fading in and out. We live in vaughan, ontario right at hwy 27 and langstaff. Our friend Dave has a video on instagram: @dangleydave, this video shows about 20 of them.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Vaughan
There were no other sightings in Vaughan on or around August 16th 2013
Summary: Red glowing Orbs hovering southwest near vaughan, ontario. Instagram: @dangleydave has a video
